title: Elon Musk's First Tweet As New Twitter Owner
content: Elon Musk the CEO and founder of Tesla and SpaceX are now become the new owner of the microblogging site Twitter by buying out 100 percent stake in the company. Yes! You read it correctly, Musk has finally bought the company with a closing deal of USD 44 billion and as the new owner of the social media platform Musk made his first tweet saying he wants to make the platform better than before. Letâ€™s have a look at the latest news...
